feature.label: BJam Integration
feature.description: Integrates BJam into Eclipse CDT. For custom Makefile projects with "bjam" as the build command this feature scans Jamfiles and presents targets. Targets can be built by clicking on them. Additionally there is syntax highlighting for Jamfiles.
